data.actual_result: It shows you your roles on your current server or message (message is as if you have no roles)
data.expected_result: It shows you your roles (or nothing in a message) on that server
data.short_description: In recent mentions, when pressing where you were mentioned, it shows up in your profile on your current server (if done in a message it seems to show a view with no roles)
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server or a message and view recent mentions - View a tag on yourself or someone else
